CustomField.description: Campo que contiene la aportación inicial del cliente
CustomField.formula: IF( AV_SavingsAmountAmount__c>= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(AV_SavingsAmountAmount__c/ 1000000)) & ".", "") & IF( AV_SavingsAmountAmount__c>= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(AV_SavingsAmountAmount__c/ 1000)), 3) & ".", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(AV_SavingsAmountAmount__c)), 3) & " " & AV_SavingsAmountCCY__c
CustomField.label: Aportación inicial del cliente
